headline: Bertram Capital Promotes Chris Brown to Partner
summary: Bertram Capital ("Bertram"), a middle market private equity firm, today announced the promotion of Chris Brown to Partner. Mr. Brown has been a member of Bertram's investment team since rejoining the firm in 2019, having previously served at Bertram from 2010 through 2015. He focuses on executing and managing investments within the firm's Industrials vertical.

content.title: Bertram Capital Promotes Chris Brown to Partner

headline: What You Need to Know for January 13, 2026
summary: 1. Fed Independence Under Fire The Justice Department’s criminal investigation into Fed Chair Jerome Powell escalated into an unprecedented institutional crisis, drawing condemnation from former Fed chairs Janet Yellen, Ben Bernanke, and Alan Greenspan. headline: SK Hynix Plans $13 Billion Memory-Chip Plant. What It Means for Micron Stock.
summary: SK Hynix said Tuesday it will build an advanced facility for packaging and testing artificial-intelligence chips in Cheongju, south of Seoul.  Memory chips have become an increasingly important component of AI accelerators.  Micron is the chief rival of  Samsung Electronics  and SK Hynix in making HBM chips.

content.title: SK Hynix Plans $13 Billion Memory-Chip Plant. What It Means for Micron Stock.

headline: Micron stock target lifted at Bank of America amid a robust pricing environment
summary: Investing.com -- Bank of America raised its price target on Micron to $400 from $300 per share in a note this week, citing stronger DRAM pricing and a favourable supply backdrop.
